text: Jerzykowice Wielkie () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lewin Kłodzki, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south- western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north- west of Lewin Kłodzki, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 80. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Jerzykowice Wielkie
